subject: Tennis
Italian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Fabio Fognini, who at No. 15 has achieved the highest ranking of any Italian man since Corrado Barrazzuti in 1979, has proved himself to be an elite player, but also one known for his behavior on the court.
snippet: Fabio Fognini, who at No. 15 has achieved the highest ranking of any Italian man since Corrado Barrazzuti in 1979, has proved himself to be an elite player, but also one known for his behavior on the court.
